name: Pollywog Charm
description: A tiny trinket that wriggles when wet.

abilities.name: Ribbit
abilities.description: Increases the health regeneration of a target ally for a duration.
notes: Does not interrupt the wielder's channeling abilities upon cast
Doubletap casts the ability on the wielder
Reapplying the buff refreshes the duration
Taking more than 0 damage from Roshan (after reductions) dispels the buff

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
